segments.advisor_message: So, um, let's talk about, like, your dependents, right? Can you tell me your, uh, your dependent's name?
segments.client_message: Yeah, yeah, um, it's Alex, uh, Alex Smith. He, like, helps me out with stuff, you know?

segments.advisor_message: Right, and when's Alex's, uh, birthday?
segments.client_message: Oh! His birthday? It's, um, 15-07-2005... I think, yeah. Wait, did I mention he's, uh, gonna be a dependent until next year? Like, till 2024?
